# 股市之神

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/gushi-zhishen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/gushi-zhishen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install gushi-zhishen
gushi-zhishen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g gushi-zhishen
gushi-zhishen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
